00001 #include <fstream>
00002 #include "RmSettings.h"

00005 RmSettings::RmSettings()
00006 {
00007         // Initialization of settings not saved to file
00008         SettingsName = "settings.dat";
00009         EnabledSonars = new bool[RmPioneerController::NumSonars];
00010         for ( int i = 0; i < RmPioneerController::NumSonars; ++i ) EnabledSonars[i] = true;
00011 
00012         // Attempt init via file
00013         if ( !read() ) 
00014         {
00015                 init();
00016         }
00017         else {
00018                 std::string iv = invalids();
00019                 if ( iv.length() > 0 ) {
00020                         std::cerr << "Settings file contains invalid data for:\n" << iv << "Using default values.\n\n";
00021                         init();
00022                 }
00023         }
00024 }

00027 RmSettings::~RmSettings()
00028 {
00029         // not called in dll mode
00030         delete[] EnabledSonars;
00031 }

00034 void RmSettings::init()
00035 {
00036         RegionIHalfwidth = 100;
00037         SonarModel = RmUtility::SingleCell;
00038 
00039         LocalMapDistance = 5000;
00040         CellSize = 100;
00041         PreRotate = false;
00042         MaxCollectionDistance = 100;
00043         MaxCollectionDegrees = 5;
00044 
00045         Beta = 15;
00046         AlphaFactor = 1.0f;
00047         MaxOccupied = 0.98f;
00048         MaxEmpty = 1.0f;
00049         OutOfRangeConversion = 1500;
00050         IgnoreOutOfRange = true;
00051         IgnoreObstructed = true;
00052 
00053         Localize = false;
00054         MotionModel.MinHeight = 0;
00055         MotionModel.MinWidth = 15;
00056         MotionModel.UnitDistance = 500;
00057         MotionModel.UnitTurn = 10;
00058         MotionModel.GaussianSigma = 5.0f;
00059         MotionModel.BendFactor = 1.0f;
00060         ObstructedCertainty = 0.7f;
00061 
00062         GridName = "default";
00063         SonarName = "";
00064 }

00066 
00067 bool RmSettings::read()
00068 {
00069         std::ifstream is( SettingsName.c_str() );
00070         if ( is ) {
00071                 is >> RegionIHalfwidth;
00072                 int sonarModel;
00073                 is >> sonarModel;
00074                 SonarModel = (RmUtility::SonarModelEnum)sonarModel;
00075                 is >> LocalMapDistance;
00076                 is >> CellSize;
00077                 is >> MaxCollectionDistance;
00078                 is >> MaxCollectionDegrees;
00079                 is >> PreRotate;
00080                 is >> Beta;
00081                 is >> AlphaFactor;
00082                 is >> MaxOccupied;
00083                 is >> MaxEmpty;
00084                 is >> OutOfRangeConversion;
00085                 is >> IgnoreOutOfRange;
00086                 is >> IgnoreObstructed;
00087                 is >> Localize;
00088                 is >> MotionModel.MinHeight;
00089                 is >> MotionModel.MinWidth;
00090                 is >> MotionModel.UnitDistance;
00091                 is >> MotionModel.UnitTurn;
00092                 is >> MotionModel.GaussianSigma;
00093                 is >> MotionModel.BendFactor;
00094                 is >> ObstructedCertainty;
00095                 is >> GridName;
00096                 is >> SonarName;
00097                 is.close();
00098                 return true;
00099         }
00100         return false;
00101 }

00103 
00104 std::string RmSettings::invalids()
00105 {
00106         const std::string pre = " - ";
00107         const std::string post = "\n";
00108         std::string invalids;
00109 
00110         if ( RegionIHalfwidth < 10 ) invalids += pre + "RegionIHalfwidth " + post;
00111         if ( SonarModel != RmUtility::SingleCell && SonarModel != RmUtility::AcousticAxis && 
00112                 SonarModel != RmUtility::Cone ) invalids += pre + "SonarModel " + post;
00113         if ( LocalMapDistance < 100 ) invalids += pre + "LocalMapDistance " + post;
00114         if ( CellSize < 1 ) invalids += pre + "CellSize " + post;
00115         if ( MaxCollectionDistance < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MaxCollectionDistance " + post;
00116         if ( MaxCollectionDegrees < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MaxCollectionDegrees " + post;
00117         if ( Beta < 7 || Beta > 90 ) invalids += pre + "Beta " + post;
00118         if ( AlphaFactor <= 0.0 ) invalids += pre + "AlphaFactor " + post;
00119         if ( MaxOccupied <= 0.0 || MaxOccupied >= 1.0 ) invalids += pre + "MaxOccupied " + post;
00120         if ( MaxEmpty <= 0.0 || MaxOccupied >= 1.0 ) invalids += pre + "MaxEmpty " + post;
00121         if ( OutOfRangeConversion < 1 ) invalids += pre + "OutOfRangeConversion " + post;
00122         if ( MotionModel.MinHeight < 0 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.MinHeight " + post;
00123         if ( MotionModel.MinWidth < 0 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.MinWidth " + post;
00124         if ( MotionModel.UnitDistance < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.UnitDistance " + post;
00125         if ( MotionModel.UnitTurn < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.UnitTurn " + post;
00126         if ( MotionModel.GaussianSigma <= 0.0 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.GaussianSigma " + post;
00127         if ( fabs( MotionModel.BendFactor ) > 20.0  ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.BendFactor " + post;
00128         if ( ObstructedCertainty < 0.0 || ObstructedCertainty > 1.0 ) {
00129                 invalids += pre + "ObstructedCertainty " + post;
00130         }
00131         if ( GridName.length() == 0 ) invalids += pre + "GridName " + post;
00132 
00133         return invalids;
00134 }

00137 void RmSettings::write()
00138 {
00139         std::ofstream os( SettingsName.c_str() );
00140         if ( os ) {
00141                 os << RegionIHalfwidth << " ";
00142                 os << SonarModel << " ";
00143                 os << LocalMapDistance << " ";
00144                 os << CellSize << " ";
00145                 os << MaxCollectionDistance << " ";
00146                 os << MaxCollectionDegrees << " ";
00147                 os << PreRotate << " ";
00148                 os << Beta << " ";
00149                 os << AlphaFactor << " ";
00150                 os << MaxOccupied << " ";
00151                 os << MaxEmpty << " ";
00152                 os << OutOfRangeConversion << " ";
00153                 os << IgnoreOutOfRange << " ";
00154                 os << IgnoreObstructed << " ";
00155                 os << Localize << " ";
00156                 os << MotionModel.MinHeight << " ";
00157                 os << MotionModel.MinWidth << " ";
00158                 os << MotionModel.UnitDistance << " ";
00159                 os << MotionModel.UnitTurn << " ";
00160                 os << MotionModel.GaussianSigma << " ";
00161                 os << MotionModel.BendFactor << " ";
00162                 os << ObstructedCertainty << " ";
00163                 os << GridName << " ";
00164                 os << SonarName;
00165         }
00166         os.close();
00167 }

00177         os << prefix << "MaxCollectionDegrees " << MaxCollectionDegrees << "\n";

00179         os << prefix << "Beta " << Beta << "\n";

00181         os << prefix << "MaxOccupied " << MaxOccupied << "\n";
00182         os << prefix << "MaxEmpty " << MaxEmpty << "\n";
00183         os << prefix << "OutOfRangeConversion " << OutOfRangeConversion << "\n";
00184         os << prefix << "IgnoreOutOfRange " << IgnoreOutOfRange << "\n";
00185         os << prefix << "IgnoreObstructed " << IgnoreObstructed << "\n";
00186         os << prefix << "Localize " << Localize << "\n";
00187         os << prefix << "MotionModel.MinHeight " << MotionModel.MinHeight << "\n";
00188         os << prefix << "MotionModel.MinWidth " << MotionModel.MinWidth << "\n";
00189         os << prefix << "MotionModel.UnitDistance " << MotionModel.UnitDistance << "\n";
00190         os << prefix << "MotionModel.UnitTurn " << MotionModel.UnitTurn << "\n";
00191         os << prefix << "MotionModel.GaussianSigma " << MotionModel.GaussianSigma << "\n";
00192         os << prefix << "MotionModel.BendFactor " << MotionModel.BendFactor << "\n";
00193         os << prefix << "ObstructedCertainty " << ObstructedCertainty << "\n";
00194         os << prefix << "GridName " << GridName << "\n";
00195         os << prefix << "SonarName " << SonarName << "\n";
